events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it arrived too small and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported issue involves a refund request for a size issue with a recently delivered jacket.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle this refund case regarding the jacket order.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear the jacket didn’t fit. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and with original tags for processing your refund?
The order number is 789456123. Yes, the jacket is still unused and has all the original tags attached.
Thank you for the information. I’ve initiated the refund process. You should see the amount back in your account within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and help. I appreciate the prompt refund initiation.
The refund case has been marked as resolved after confirming the refund initiation and customer satisfaction.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, the refund appeared in my bank account yesterday. Everything is perfect now, thank you!
We are glad your refund was successful. Closing the case now, but feel free to reach out anytime.
Please take a moment to fill out our customer satisfaction survey regarding your refund experience.
